subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Stefan Schumacher was the fastest rider on every part of the wind-blown course, finishing 18 seconds ahead of both Kim Kirchen and David Millar.
snippet: Stefan Schumacher was the fastest rider on every part of the wind-blown course, finishing 18 seconds ahead of both Kim Kirchen and David Millar.
